params._actions: The actions to be executed by the DAO.

returns._0: Returns `true` if the interface is supported.

ADMIN_EXECUTE_PERMISSION_ID().notice: The ID of the permission required to call the `execute` function.

execute((address,uint256,bytes)[]).notice: Executes actions in the associated DAO.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Checks if this or the parent contract supports an interface by its ID.

documentation.text: @notice The ID of the permission required to call the `execute` function.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32,struct IDAO.Action memory[] memory,uint256) external returns (bytes memory[] memory,uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Executes actions in the associated DAO.
 @param _actions The actions to be executed by the DAO.
